attributes.title: Led by an orange Oompa Loompa
attributes.review: His stinky nasty breath made it to the Apple store he needs to be banned. And if u clearly like this app u must be on crack because this mans is an orange smelly nasty weirdo. Clear yeh does wipe his butt and u can tell cuz his app is doodoo.

attributes.title: 🙌✨This app sucks✨🙌
attributes.review: Took way too long to download and this weird Cheeto looking dude popped up as soon as you open the app.... 10/10 would never open and or use this app. Kinda trash not gonna lie.

attributes.title: THIS APP CAUSED A VIRUS IN MY PHONE!!
attributes.review: This app not only took FOREVER to download, but once I downloaded it, it caused my phone to glitch. It went straight to YouTube and uploaded a video called “Things were getting a little wild at Caillou’s house.” Me, as a young adult, could not handle such a thing. My virgin eyes had uncontrollable tears coming out of them. I did everything I could to try and X out of the video, but my poor soul had to watch the whole thing. Once that terrible video ended, my phone froze FOR A WHOLE WEEK! Once I deleted the app, however, my phone worked perfectly fine. I guess his uncontrollable app caused a virus... And for that reason I am giving it a 1 Star, if I could give it less than that, I would. Absolute trash!!!

attributes.title: ✨SUCKS✨
attributes.review: it keeps kicking me out every time i try to go in,  this app has no meaning if you can’t get in i think it should just be deleted it dosent even work even if you try

attributes.title: ✨this is bad✨
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support the orange Oompa Loompa but it took 2 weeks to download into my phone and when it did it kept asking personal information to sent to the president himself. ex.how many boyfriends have I had,am I a virgin and how old I am i told him that I was a minor and I kept getting spam messages from him 24/7 so i blocked the number and took the app away, three weeks later I opened the door to a police man offering me to have a face call with ✨donald✨ but I refused because I knew he would be asking for ✨🧚🏽nudes✨🧚🏽 so I then wrote this statement to make him feel ashamed.(he probably won’t since he has abused numerous minors)
P.S savebarron2020 I hone his son is ok

attributes.title: Expected more from POTUS
attributes.review: As a firm member of the Republican Party and a woman who has strong feelings for our dear Commander in Peach, I am wholly disappointed in this app. It is constantly loading my phone up with notifications. It honestly feels like spam! I fully expect way more from the president of the United States! Having a campaign app that spams it’s users with FAKE NEWS, blatantly only cares for the wealthy, and crashes all the time with nonsensical “facts” reflects our POTUS perfectly. F*ck Trump ;)
